sentences.sContent: Some of these bacteria are actually good for you.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some of these bacteria are actually good for you.
sentences.sCn: 实际上，这些细菌有的对你是很有好处的。

sentences.sContent: When you eat off the plate, all of those bacteria go into your stomach.
sentences.sContent_eng: When you eat off the plate, all of those bacteria go into your stomach.
sentences.sCn: 当你吃掉了盘子里的食物时，这些细菌就会进入你的肚子。

sentences.sContent: But she correctly points out that bacteria are everywhere: on us, in us and all around us.
sentences.sContent_eng: But she correctly points out that bacteria are everywhere: on us, in us and all around us.
sentences.sCn: 但是她正确地指出细菌无处不在：在我们身上，在我们体内以及在我们周围。

phrases.pCn: 厌氧细菌，厌氧菌；嫌气细菌
醋酸菌；乙酸菌；醋酸细菌

remMethod.val: bac(看作back， 背后) ＋ ter ＋ ia(病) → 总是偷偷(背后)让人得病的东西 → 细菌

words.tran: 细菌学的，[微] 细菌学上的
[生化] 溶菌作用；细菌分解处理

trans.tranOther: very small living things, some of which cause illness or disease
